title: It Ain't Coca-Cola
description:
rice's label debut and first release as a trio.

Side A: Jittery vocals mingle with synthesized percussion and ominous drones—our love letter to Coil.

Side B: Inspired by nostalgic Christmas movies and frozen lakes. Layering lush synth choruses and romantic melodies with resonant bells and biting metallic timbres, the slowly-evolving narrative structure lets you sink in and reminisce.

title: At Least a Pound
description:
rice's first release, comprised of early sets performed in 2015–2016 and recorded in 2016–2018. The band was a keyboard and percussion duo at the time.

An in-depth description of the pieces can be found in the liner notes on Bandcamp, written by our good friend Mark Mahoney.
